clinical_study.brief_title: Food Anthocyanins and Flavanols as a Strategy for a Healthy Ageing: Cardiovascular Health and Cognitive Performance
clinical_study.official_title: Food Anthocyanins and Flavanols as a Strategy for a Healthy Ageing: Cardiovascular Health and Cognitive Performance

brief_summary.textblock: The study examines the effect of cocoa flavanols, red-berries anthocyanins or a combination of both on markers of cardiovascular health and cognition.

detailed_description.textblock:
The study examines the effect of cocoa flavanols, red-berries anthocyanins or a combination of both on markers of cardiovascular health and cognition.
Healthy volunteers are recruited to participate in a parallel study (n 30 per group) for 10 to 12 weeks. Markers of cardiovascular health (FMD, markers of inflammation and fatty acid metabolism) and cognition (neuropsychological tests and plasma neurotrophins) are being measured before and after intervention.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of flow-mediated vasodilatation (FMD) of the brachial artery
primary_outcome.time_frame: Over 6 minutes on day 0 and after10 weeks
primary_outcome.description: The FMD of the brachial artery will be measured using an ultrasound collected at baseline and continuously for 60 seconds post-arm occlusion for 5 minutes. FMD will be expressed as percentage of variation between pre-and postischemic diameters

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline STROOP score after 10 weeks intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at inclusion and 10 weeks after intervention
secondary_outcome.description: STROOP tests attention and executive function. This test aims to evaluate the inhibition of an automated process such as reading by asking participants to name the color of color names written in a different color ink. For each participant SROOP results at inclusion will be compared with results after 10 weeks intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline Tower of London score after 10 weeks intervention
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at inclusion and 10 weeks after intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Tower of London test consist of a three color game board that allows executive functioning evaluation by total time, time to first move and optimal moves change from participants inclusion to week 11.

arm_group.description: Cocoa is taken every day for 10-12 weeks.
Red-berries are taken every day for 10-12 weeks.
Cooa and red-berries are taken every day for 10-12 weeks.

intervention.description: Effect of cocoa flavanols and berries anthocyanins on cardiovascular and cognitive health

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 50-85
- BMI 20-32 Kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Mini-mental state examination (MMSE) < 28
- Systolic blood pressure (SBP) >139 mmHg
- Diastolic blood pressure (DBP) > 89 mmHg
- Total cholesterol > 6.5 mmol/L
